actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to the consideration and reporting of a concurrent resolution on the budget for the fiscal year 1976.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that, if a concurrent resolution on the budget is considered and reported under title III of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 for the fiscal year beginning July 1, 1975, such resolution should set forth a balanced budget and should include proposals for a reduction in the national debt.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to the consideration and reporting of a concurrent resolution on the budget for the fiscal year 1976.
